post:
Hello everyone,

We have a few Core i5 and Pentium servers ready to go for anyone who wish to have a server in the mighty viking lands of Norway!

Who are we?

Terrahost is a hosting provider located in Sandefjord, Norway. We own and operate our own datacenters. We have transits with Telenor and Altibox and operate our own BGP backed network.

LG: http://lg.terrahost.no/  
AS INFO: https://bgp.he.net/AS203629


**Server 1**  
Intel Core i5  
8GB RAM  
500GB SATA  
5 TB @ 1Gbps  

20 EUR / mo (199 NOK)

Order here: https://terrahost.no/handlekurv/1845

**Server 2**  
Intel Pentium G3220/G3258  
8GB RAM  
250GB SSD  
5 TB @ 1Gbps  

20 EUR / mo (199 NOK)

Order here: https://terrahost.no/handlekurv/1739


** VAT is removed once logged in.**
